mapper.select: SELECT t.*, @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM FROM ( SELECT EDUCATION_NO AS education_no , HOUSE_CODE AS house_code , EDUCATION_NAME AS education_name , DATE_FORMAT(EDUCATION_START, '%Y-%m-%d') AS education_start , DATE_FORMAT(EDUCATION_START, '%Y') AS education_start_year , DATE_FORMAT(EDUCATION_START, '%m') AS education_start_month , DATE_FORMAT(EDUCATION_START, '%d') AS education_start_day , DATE_FORMAT(EDUCATION_END, '%Y-%m-%d') AS education_end , DATE_FORMAT(EDUCATION_END + INTERVAL 1 DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') AS education_end2 , DATE_FORMAT(EDUCATION_END, '%Y') AS education_end_year , DATE_FORMAT(EDUCATION_END, '%m') AS education_end_month , DATE_FORMAT(EDUCATION_END, '%d') AS education_end_day , A.DEL_YN AS del_yn , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS reg_date , A.WRITER AS writer , B.NAME AS name FROM R_HOUSE A LEFT JOIN R_ADMIN B ON A.WRITER = B.ID ) t, ( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) R WHERE t.HOUSE_CODE = #{house_code} AND t.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT EDUCATION_NO AS education_no , HOUSE_CODE AS house_code , EDUCATION_NAME AS education_name , EDUCATION_START AS education_start , EDUCATION_END AS education_end , DEL_YN AS del_yn , REG_DATE AS reg_date , WRITER AS writer FROM R_HOUSE ) t WHERE t.HOUSE_CODE = #{house_code} AND t.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT EDUCATION_NO AS education_no , HOUSE_CODE AS house_code , EDUCATION_NAME AS education_name , DATE_FORMAT(EDUCATION_START, '%Y-%m-%d') AS education_start , DATE_FORMAT(EDUCATION_END, '%Y-%m-%d') AS education_end , DEL_YN AS del_yn , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS reg_date , WRITER AS writer FROM R_HOUSE WHERE EDUCATION_NO = #{education_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO R_HOUSE (EDUCATION_NO, HOUSE_CODE, EDUCATION_NAME, EDUCATION_START, EDUCATION_END, REG_DATE, DEL_YN, WRITER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_WRITER) SELECT IFNULL(MAX(EDUCATION_NO)+1, 1), #{house_code}, #{education_name}, #{education_start}, #{education_end}, NOW(), 'N', #{writer}, NOW(), #{writer} FROM R_HOUSE

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT R_EDU_NO AS r_edu_no , R_EDU_TITLE AS r_edu_title , DATE_FORMAT(R_EDU_START, '%Y-%m-%d') AS r_edu_start , DATE_FORMAT(R_EDU_END, '%Y-%m-%d') AS r_edu_end , R_EDU_PLACE AS r_edu_place , R_EDU_TEL AS r_edu_tel , R_EDU_SUMMARY AS r_edu_summary , CONVERT(R_EDU_CONTENTS USING utf8) AS r_edu_contents , ATTACHED_FILE_ID AS attached_file_id , CASE WHEN (SELECT USE_AT FROM R_COMM_FILE WHERE A.ATTACHED_FILE_ID = ATCH_FILE_ID) = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS attached_file_yn , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM R_COMM_FILE_DETAIL WHERE A.ATTACHED_FILE_ID = ATCH_FILE_ID) AS attached_file_cnt , REGION_CODE AS region_code , (SELECT REGION_NAME FROM R_REGION_TABLE WHERE A.REGION_CODE = REGION_CODE) AS REGION_NAME , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS reg_date , A.WRITER AS writer , A.DEL_YN AS del_yn FROM R_REGIONAL_EDU A WHERE 1=1
AND A.R_EDU_TITLE LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%') OR A.R_EDU_CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%') OR A.WRITER LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
AND A.R_EDU_TITLE LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
AND A.R_EDU_CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
AND A.WRITER LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
AND A.REGION_CODE = #{region_code}
) t WHERE t.DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO R_REGIONAL_EDU (R_EDU_NO, R_EDU_TITLE, R_EDU_START, R_EDU_END, R_EDU_PLACE, R_EDU_TEL, R_EDU_SUMMARY, R_EDU_CONTENTS, REGION_CODE, ATTACHED_FILE_ID, DISPLAY_YN, REG_DATE, DEL_YN, WRITER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_WRITER) SELECT IFNULL(MAX(r_edu_no)+1, 1), #{r_edu_title}, #{r_edu_start}, #{r_edu_end}, #{r_edu_place}, #{r_edu_tel}, #{r_edu_summary}, #{r_edu_contents}, #{region_code}, #{attached_file_id}, #{display_yn}, NOW(), 'N', #{writer}, NOW(), #{writer} FROM R_REGIONAL_EDU
